headline: Trump’s Former Jobs Data Chief Decries Firing of Successor
summary: (Bloomberg) -- President Donald Trump’s firing of the chief labor statistician was criticized by her predecessor, who called it an unfounded move that will undermine confidence in a key data set on the US economy. headline: BAC Applauds Landmark Passage of Trigger Lead Ban
summary: WASHINGTON, August 03, 2025--The Broker Action Coalition (BAC) welcomes the passage of the Homebuyers Privacy Protection Act, bipartisan legislation that limits the sale of trigger leads. With the Senate passing the House version on August 2, the bill has officially cleared Congress and now heads to the President’s desk. The BAC urges President Trump to sign the bill into law without delay.

The BAC urges President Trump to sign the bill into law without delay.

headline: Banks Confront Weakening Economic Data After Strong Run
summary: Weakening economic data, underscored by surprisingly poor payroll numbers on Friday, is challenging the strong environment that’s coalesced around the sector.

raw.headline: Banks Confront Weakening Economic Data After Strong Run
